articles.title: UK care workers use up leave to avoid losing pay while sick with Covid - The Guardian
articles.description: Failure to pay some staff’s wages in full while off sick raises fears they will keep working rather than self-isolate

Some UK care workers are having to take holiday when they are off sick with Covid or see already low wages fall to £96 per week, raising fears they may not self-isolate.
